item.title: Help with my client`?
item.dc:creator: @tor0en tor0en
item.description:
@tor0en wrote:

hey i need help with my client, this is what i want to do.

when you start the client and are going to login, u need to write teh ip address, and i want to take away that so i can just write inn username and password.

so the point is that i want to set a defult port and ip in the client.java

this is some code u should look at:

     method64(0);

        if(anInt833 == 0) {

            i += 30;

        }

            int j = c1 / 2 - 40;
            if(aString1266.length() > 0) {
                aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method382(0xffff00, c / 2, anInt939, aString1266, j - 15, true);
                aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method382(0xffff00, c / 2, anInt939, aString1267, j, true);
                j += 15;
            } else {
                aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method382(0xffff00, c / 2, anInt939, aString1267, j - 7, true);
                j += 15;
            }
            aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xffffFF, "Username: " + aString1173 + ((anInt1216 == 0) & (anInt1161 % 40 < 20) ? "@xxx@|" : ""), j);
            j += 15;
            aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xffffff, "Password: " + Class50.method588(aString1174, 0) + ((anInt1216 == 1) & (anInt1105 % 40 < 20) ? "|" : ""), j);
            j += 15;

            j += 15;
            aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xfff00, "@whi@Port: " + port + ((anInt1216 == 3) & (anInt1105 % 40 < 20) ? "@xxx@|" : ""), j);
            j += 15;
            if(!flag) {
                int i1 = c / 2 - 80;
                int l1 = c1 / 2 + 50;
                aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub2_967.method361(i1 - 73, 16083, l1 - 20);

and this
